roleset.name: sell stocks short

example.name: short-v: wsj-ese strikes again!
example.text: For example, [an investor]-1 may seek *-1 to profit during some takeover situations by [*] buying stock in one company involved and shorting the stock of the other.

roleset.note: SHORT-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from short.01-v)

roleset.name: short-circuit

role.descr: circuit, electrical appliance, or metaphorical extension

example.name: short-v: usually ergative
example.text: When the swaying of the building woke me up, I reasoned that a) I was in Southern California; b) the bed was moving; c) it must be a Magic Fingers bed that [*T*] had shorted.

example.name: short-circuit-v
example.text: In test tubes, this short-circuited the molecular cascade.

roleset.note: SHORT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from short.02-v)

roleset.name: short change

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: When the rubber studs rotted away , the motor fell on the floor , followed by a torrent of rain that shorted out everything under the dash .

example.name: short-v: when the 'change' is really a chicken nugget.
example.text: If I worked as a grill cook at McDonald's and I shorted Bryan Mills a chicken nugget, what would happen?

example.name: short_change-m
example.text: The girl working short changed him $2.

roleset.note: SHORT-V NOTES: No Vncls. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from short.03-v) Then updated again during MWE framing.
Not restricted to money; can be used anytime someone doesn't receiveeverything they "should" be getting. (from short.03-v)

roleset.name: crumbly due to heavy fat content (as pie crust)

example.name: short-j: the arg
example.text: The crust was short and crumbly, the filling achieved that perfect balance between sweetness and nuttiness, and the piece paired perfectly with a handsome glass of honeyed Geyser Peak late harvest semillon.

roleset.note: SHORT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from short.04-j)

roleset.name: not having enough to reach a goal

role.descr: what arg1 doesn't have enough of, amount short
goal arg1 is short of reaching

example.name: short-j: arg2
example.text: Between Russia and Iran , they would have access to enormous oil reserves , from which they could , if supplies were too short , deny the U.S. Saudi Arabia comes to mind as well .

example.name: short-j: args 1, 2
example.text: She had a cart full of groceries and when it was time for her to pay she was short $10.
example.arg: when it was time for her to pay

example.name: short-j: args 1, 3
example.text: The other day I was in post office and there was a guy who [*] was 2 years short of the retirement and he was making 50,000$/year.

example.name: short-j: because arg3 applies to the money frame
example.text: I was $10 short of getting on the Greyhound bus.
example.arg: of getting on the Greyhound bus.

example.name: fall_short-l
example.text: Canada's Defence Spending Increased But Still Fell Short Of Alliance's Target.

roleset.note: SHORT-J NOTES: Updated by Julia based on BOLT-1, closely related to short-v.03, but impossible to combine (from short.01-j)

roleset.name: minimal length/duration

role.descr: domain in which arg1 isn't long

example.name: short-j: arg1
example.text: There was an error posting your comment. Maybe it was too short?

roleset.note: SHORT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from short.02-j)
SHORTER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from shorter.02-j)

roleset.name: snippy, brusk

example.name: short-j: all args
example.text: Yesterday we got into an argument because I was short with him about something.

roleset.note: SHORT-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from short.03-j)

roleset.name: make shorter

example.name: shorten-v: start and end points
example.text: Mr. Krampe also said that Mercedes plans to bring out new models every year through the mid-1990s and it will shorten its product development cycle to eight years from 10 or 12 years to compete more effectively with Toyota Motor Corp.'s Lexus, Nissan Motor Co.'s Infiniti and Honda Motor Co.'s Acura luxury-car divisions.
example.arg: to compete more effectively with Toyota Motor Corp.'s Lexus, Nissan Motor Co.'s Infiniti and Honda Motor Co.'s Acura luxury-car divisions.

example.name: shorten-v: Arg0, 1
example.text: Google has improved its shortening of URLs.

roleset.note: SHORTEN-V NOTES: Comparison to other quantifiable-change verbs (rise, etc). Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. (from shorten.01-v)
